topic.title: Anyone from Berlin?
topic.body: I am looking from anyone from Berlin to help me out with something, it is really important

topic.title: Anyone here who feels like the world needs to burn down?
topic.body: Is there someone so misanthropic, full of hate, bent upon bringing the world to its knees?

topic.title: The disappointment after waking up again
topic.body: I woke up after a vodka and xanax OD. This is severely disappointing and embarrising after i told people good bye. what the fuck

relatable, but can you help?

> [kidcourageous](#comment_218_1aaGBN84Cc8VE7iocUxPXiRVhx9qSfXw6): Look up Uncle Fester's Silent Death, Homemade Explosives Workshop, & Vest Busters

> [kidcourageous](#comment_220_1aaGBN84Cc8VE7iocUxPXiRVhx9qSfXw6): Damn it man your woman was raped by a sand nigger. Get your ass over there and flay him like a fucking perch

I FUCKING WOULD. EXCEPT THAT IT WOULD TAKE ME AGES TO GET A VISA, I AM NOT GERMAN. I WOULD FUCKING BURN IT DOWN

> [kidcourageous](#comment_221_1aaGBN84Cc8VE7iocUxPXiRVhx9qSfXw6): What country are you in? I have family in the senate I can probably do something :/

I am from South Asia. Getting visa is extremely hard and I cant do anything for another year for that. I am new to the zites, Tell me how to send you a PM. I need that guy ruined. destroyed.

How do i contact you man?

> [totheend](#comment_3_1AY3JJVDvoGg5vyouaucsYFbtbrT2XonMM): When I was a younger man, I thought Helios was the correct path.  Now, I see that Tracer Tong was right.  I don't think the whole world needs to burn, but technological advancement - specifically information technology - seems to be doing us more harm than good.

I relate! That is the only way to bring the world on its knees!

I did! but now it seems i have lost it. I just woke up from another attempt

Much appreciated.
